name: Pocoyo Party
description:
Pocoyo’s first videogame is educational, fun for all the family... oh, and MULTIPLAYER.
Come play with Pocoyo and friends in these 6 great educational mini-games where you will learn letters, numbers, colours and much more! Win rewards by completing levels: puzzles, pictures and exclusives episodes of Pocoyo that you can watch any time. Play with all the main characters in the series in multiplayer mode for up to 4 players. Pocoyo, Nina, Pato and Elly await you!

Enjoy a graphical environment designed by the creators of the hit TV series and the same original music and voices.
Pocoyo Party is a videogame for children aged 3 to 5. With the help of their parents, they will enjoy activities and games that are simple, fun and also educational.

Pocoyo Party has been tailored to their ability and skill, and the content is backed both by professionals and our own experience as creators of content for young children and pre-schoolers
